name: Matrimonium
additionalNotes:
Lovingly Handmade in Nicaragua at the AJ Fernandez factory.

Perfect for Weddings, Anniversaries, Engagements & Bachelor Parties.

Unique "barber pole" design featuring two wrapper leaves becoming one, representing 2 becoming one in marriage.

Gorgeous Connecticut wrapper blended with a Rich Habano Oscuro wrapper - a match made in Heaven 

6 inches long x 50 ring gauge dressed with a gold ribbon at the bottom to represent a wedding band.
